cast.overview: Zia, distraught over breaking up with his girlfriend, decides to end it all. Unfortunately, he discovers that there is no real ending, only a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one, just a bit worse. Discovering that his ex-girlfriend has also "offed" herself, he sets out on a road trip to find her.
cast.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story

details.biography: Bridget "The Midget" Powers is a porn and mainstream movie star and feature stripper. Born Cheryl Marie Murphy, Bridget is a dwarf, standing 3'7" tall, and found success first in porn, which lead to appearances on Howard Stern's TV and radio show, and soon in Hollywood movies such as S.W.A.T.  and Confessions Of A Dangerous Mind. Bridget was also featured in HBO's "Cathouse", a documentary series covering a legal Nevada brothel, which increased her exposure. Bridget has retired from porn but still takes the occasional mainstream movie or TV role and is a feature dancer on the strip club circuit.
details.name: Bridget Powers
